com.concordia.riskgame.controller

Class CommandController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordia.riskgame.controller.CommandController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CommandController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to parse the commands entered by user and perform actions based on commands

      • validateEditContinentCommand

        public static boolean validateEditContinentCommand(java.lang.String command)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method reads editcontinent command, validates the command and add continent to add or remove to list.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to validate
        Returns:
        True if the command is valid, else false.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the command entered is invalid.

      • gamePlayerAddRemove

        public static void gamePlayerAddRemove(java.lang.String operation,
                                       java.lang.String playername,
                                       java.lang.String playerstrategy)
        This method add or remove player based on the type of operation user wants to perform.
        Parameters:
        operation - Type of Operation, either add or remove
        playername - The name of the player to be added or removed.
        playerstrategy - The playerstrategy.
